tool_description: We provide a convenient way to obtain up-to-date and accurate data about holidays such as national holidays, religious observances, and cultural celebrations.
name: Public holidays
title: Public holidays

api_list.name: Get Country Holiday By Year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://public-holidays7.p.rapidapi.com/2023/US"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "public-holidays7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://public-holidays7.p.rapidapi.com/{year}/{statecode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "public-holidays7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
